content: this legal document outlines the division of assets between two parties mr bm and mrs bc it specifies the properties involved including an apartment on the ground and first floors and a woodshed on the ground floor the document states that the parties have agreed to divide the assets into two shares mr bm will receive full ownership of the ground and firstfloor apartment while mrs bc will receive full ownership of the basement ground and firstfloor apartment as well as a 12 share of the woodshed each share is valued at €75000 the document also mentions two donations but the details are not provided
